test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/robometry/BufferManager.h
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/librobometry${SHLIB_EXT}
    - python -m pip install git+https://github.com/ami-iit/cmake-package-check@v0.0.1
    - cmake-package-check robometry
  requires:
    - cmake
    - gcc_linux-64 12.*
    - git
    - gxx_linux-64 12.*
    - jinja2
    - ninja
    - pip
    - pkg-config
    - python >=3.12,<3.13.0a0
about:
  home: https://github.com/robotology/robometry
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Telemetry library for logging data.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - traversaro
